backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining access‑controlled storage and CRUD types for cashflows, properties, loans, wealth inputs, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of many frontend files for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode palette, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/offline-bundle/bundle.config.js: Config defining build output, zip name, port, and metadata for generating the offline bundle.
frontend/offline-bundle/create-windows-o: Creates a Windows offline ZIP bundle by validating the build folder and packaging build assets and helper scripts using archiver.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.txt: User‑facing overview and quick‑start guide for the Windows offline application bundle.
frontend/offline-bundle/start-server-win: Batch script that checks for Node.js and npx, then launches a local static server for the offline app.
PowerShell launcher that checks for Node.js or Python and starts a local server to host the offline app.
frontend/offline-bundle/WINDOWS_RUN_INST: Detailed instructions for running the offline bundle using a local server on Windows.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that caches core assets, cleans old caches, and provides offline support including SPA navigation fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry configuring routes, React Query, theme provider, service worker registration, and global layout guards.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Pass-through auth wrapper that simply renders its children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Placeholder login button component that currently renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting users to enter and save their name via React Query, shown only when no profile exists.
App layout providing header, navigation, footer, and routing outlet with responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/navigation/NavLi: Navigation component mapping predefined routes to link buttons and highlighting the active path.
frontend/src/components/storage/IndexedD: Checks IndexedDB availability and either renders children or shows an error screen with guidance if storage is unavailable.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, summarize, add/update, and delete cashflow entries via the storage repo.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/component: Renders a table of cashflow entries with edit and delete actions, including confirmation handling.
Form card for creating or editing cashflow entries with validation and mutation handling.
Displays summary cards showing totals to collect, totals to give, and net balance.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/api.ts: Exposes a React Query hook that generates the daily profit/loss report from storage.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/component: Renders a table of day‑wise profit/loss summaries sorted by date.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/api.ts: Aggregates dashboard metrics including net worth, asset totals, and monthly loan cashflow.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Displays a KPI card showing monthly cashflow from interest income.
Provides quick navigation buttons to add new loans or properties.
Shows a donut chart of asset allocation across properties, lending, and wealth inputs.
frontend/src/features/lending/api.ts: React Query hooks for listing, creating/updating, and deleting loans with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/lending/components: Displays lending analytics using bar and pie charts, computing monthly interest and principal vs interest totals.
Form component to add or edit a loan with validation and mutation handling.
Renders a table of loans with calculated interest totals and supports editing and deletion.
frontend/src/features/mpl/api.ts: React Query hooks for managing matches, entries, P&L summary, and match settlement with cache updates.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Cre: Dialog for creating a new match with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Ent: Table component displaying betting entries with loading and empty states.
Form component to add a betting entry for a match, handling validation, mutation, and form reset.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Mat: Displays detailed match info, entries, P/L summary, and settlement actions with conditionally rendered components.
Shows a list of matches with status badges, enabling selection or displaying an empty state.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Set: Dialog for settling a match by selecting a winner and triggering a settle mutation.
frontend/src/features/mpl/utils/pl.ts: Utility functions to calculate team P/L for scenarios and compute opposite P/L for entries.
frontend/src/features/networth/api.ts: React Query hooks for listing, updating, and aggregating wealth inputs and net worth values.
frontend/src/features/networth/component: Renders styled summary cards showing net worth, property value, lending portfolio, and wealth inputs.
Form to view and update latest wealth inputs with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/features/properties/api.ts: React-query hooks for listing, creating/updating, and deleting properties using the storage repo with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/properties/compone: Displays properties in a card grid with edit/delete actions and a delete confirmation dialog.
Form card for adding or editing a property, handling validation, mutation, and form reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CashflowPage.tsx: Cashflow management page showing summary cards, entry form, and table with edit support.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProfitLossPage.t: Daily profit/loss report page summarizing totals and displaying daily breakdown in a table.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutiveDashboardPag: Loads dashboard overview data and displays KPI cards, quick actions, and a wealth donut with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MatchProfitLossPage.t: Manages match selection and displays match list or match details, with loading states and match creation support.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyLendingPage.tsx: Lists loans, provides a loan form for creating or editing, and shows lending insights with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NetWorthPage.tsx: Fetches net worth summary and displays summary cards and a form for wealth inputs with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyLedgerPage.ts: Manages property creation and editing and displays a grid of properties with loading and empty views.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/queryInvalidation.ts: Provides functions to invalidate related React Query caches for aggregates, loans, properties, cashflow, wealth inputs, and MPL data.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Defines hierarchical React Query keys for loans, properties, wealth inputs, aggregates, dashboard, user profile, cashflow, daily P/L, and MPL.
frontend/src/storage/aggregates.ts: Computes totals for property value, lending portfolio, wealth inputs, and net worth using IndexedDB repositories.
frontend/src/storage/cashflowRepo.ts: CRUD for cashflow entries in IndexedDB and computes total credits, debits, and net balance.
frontend/src/storage/dailyPl.ts: Generates daily profit/loss reports by grouping cashflow entries by day and summarizing totals.
frontend/src/storage/ids.ts: Generates auto-incrementing bigint IDs using a counters store in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/storage/indexedDb.ts: Initializes and manages the IndexedDB database, object stores, and utility functions for CRUD operations.
frontend/src/storage/loansRepo.ts: Handles loan CRUD operations in IndexedDB with bigint deserialization and ID generation.
frontend/src/storage/mplPlSummary.ts: Calculates match P/L summaries for both teams based on betting entries and match outcome.
frontend/src/storage/mplRepo.ts: Manages match and entry records in IndexedDB, including listing, creating, updating settlement, and enforcing settled-match rules.
frontend/src/storage/profile.ts: Stores and retrieves a single local user profile entry from the IndexedDB 'profile' store.
frontend/src/storage/propertiesRepo.ts: Provides CRUD-style functions for properties in IndexedDB, handling bigint field deserialization and ID generation.
frontend/src/storage/timestamps.ts: Generates a bigint timestamp in microseconds from the current time.
frontend/src/storage/wealthInputsRepo.ts: Handles listing, creating, updating, and deleting wealth input records in IndexedDB with bigint-safe deserialization.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numeric values into INR currency strings using Indian locale rules.
frontend/src/utils/storageErrors.ts: Maps IndexedDB errors to user-friendly messages and logs detailed storage errors for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project-wide state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and feature tracking metadata.
